topics.body:
Oh for fuck's sakes.  This "religious rights" movement is fucking insanity.  Basically what happened was that the department of justice ruled that a university in Oregon could discriminate against transgender students. . . So apparently discriminating against glbt is considered a expression of religious freedom.

What does this mean?  All those anti-glbt discrimination laws are now trashed cause all a company or school needs to do is file for religious exemption.  All that work the last decade for glbt rights have now been torn to shreds.
